name: Aqua Aero, LLC
about: Aqua Aero, LLC, established in 2020 by David Lackey, a former airline pilot, certificated flight instructor, and FAA Designated Pilot Examiner, offers comprehensive seaplane training in Wilmington, North Carolina. Located on the North East Cape Fear, our riverfront facility provides a serene and ideal training environment. Students can earn their seaplane rating in just three days, utilizing our Maule M-7-260 Amphibious aircraft. We also offer air tours of the coastal community, including the downtown Wilmington waterfront and Carolina coastline. Our dedicated instructors use proven teaching strategies to ensure safe and efficient training. Whether you're seeking a seaplane rating or an aerial adventure, Aqua Aero guarantees a memorable and professional experience.
